They find it very flattering and consider it good value for money. However, some customers report issues with the sequins snagging on the sleeves. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfort and quality!
items.body: It was a perfect fit right out of the package! The color was deep and rich, and the sequins were beautiful. It was so comfortable - like wearing a nightgown! It flowed beautifully and stretched just the right amount to keep up with my dance moves! It's wrinkle-resistant and the zipper moves smoothly. The photo makes the dress look red, but it is NOT - it's a beautiful wine color! Read more
items.author: lastoryteller

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegance and Savings!
items.body: This dress is great! Fit perfectly, looks elegant and more expensive than its price. I wore it to and evening formal event and I blended with the other attendees (which was my goal). Thereâ€™s is enough stretch to accommodate in between size areas and the empire/A line cut is so flattering! I def recommend this dress for any formal event you might have coming up. Read more
items.author: susan smith

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress, wrong color
items.body: This dress was very pretty, but I had to return it. It was advertised as burgundy, but was really more of a true red. Also, although I could have managed with the fit, it did run a bit small. I was especially pleased with the length, which was perfect for a petite person and didn't drag the floor! Read more
items.author: SusieQ

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous dress!
items.body: This dress is stunning -- STUNNING! The high-sparkle of the top portion is beautiful. I am 5' and 170 lbs and the 14W fit me perfectly and was the exact length (floor length) that I needed for an upcoming wedding. So glad to save money and not need have it altered at all. The navy was just that -- navy. Exactly navy. Perfect -- love it! Read more
items.author: B Miller

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Loved the dress, but quality was not what it should have been
items.body: I bought this dress for a formal event. It is beautiful, fit well. But the sequins kept getting stuck on each other. Only wore it for a bout 4 hours and there is a rip in the arm. Didnâ€™t snag it on anything. Truly loved the fit and the looks of it, but disappointed in the quality. Read more
items.author: Ashley Anderson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful design
items.body: Loved it and it fited perfect, nice quality and very comfortable Read more
items.author: Suzanne

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Dress!
items.body: The dress is perfect! I had ordered another dress and it was nothing like the picture. I ordered this one instead and it was perfect! Perfect fit and looks exactly like the picture. Thank you! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Zipper broken
items.body: I really liked the dress until I went to wear it for my event and the zipper was broken at the ribbon part. It separated and would not go back together. I had to find something else last minute to wear to my event. And now it is taking forever to get my money back. Read more
items.author: Casey

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Evening Formal V Neck Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Evening Formal V Neck Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: White, Burgundy, Rose Gold, Black, Navy Blue, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
